title: Realme Pad Mini packs an 8.7-inch display and a 6,400mAh battery in a slim body
content:
Realme joined the Android tablet bandwagon with the Realme Pad last year. Now the Chinese company has released a brand new tablet called the Realme Pad Mini. The latest tablet focuses on portability and affordability and offers a decent hardware package, including an 8.7-inch display, a slim design, and a large battery. Realme Pad Mini:

The post Realme Pad Mini packs an 8.7-inch display and a 6,400mAh battery in a slim body appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Realme has launched the Realme Pad Mini, an affordable Android tablet that packs a 8.7-inch display, Unisoc T616 SoC, and a 6,400mAh battery.
